title: Adobe Font Folio 25 Per Cent Off\*
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013185630/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 8.Jul.2008 10.05am 

**Take your love to a higher level with up to 25% off.**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013185630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/screenshot1_4593.gif)

Expand your design options in print, web, and electronic  
documents with Adobe® Font Folio® 11 software. Get  
savings, compliance, and great fonts. In addition, check  
out these great features:

• Utilize award-winning Adobe Original typefaces  
and one-of-a-kind designs created by expert type  
designers at Adobe.  
• Enjoy updates to the Adobe Type Library, including  
revisions to many fonts.  
• Print confidently knowing you will get reliable quality to  
inkjet printers, laser printers, imagesetters, or  
platesetters.  
• Get all new and existing users a legitimate collection to  
maintain font license compliance. [Learn more.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013185630/http:/direct.adobe.com/r?xJnWqvPEnWTTJEcqPnWPv)

Order today and discover more than 170 new type  
fonts—all in OpenType® format— [and save 25%.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013185630/http:/direct.adobe.com/r?xJnWqvPEnWTTlEcqPnWPW)

**Your Promo Code: FF11PROMO**

[Get the Font FAQs and see what is included.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013185630/http:/direct.adobe.com/r?xJnWqvPEnWTTTEcqPnWnc)

\*Offer available on orders of Adobe Font Folio 11 placed June 9, 2008 through September 7, 2008. Discount off 5-User Pack is 10%. Discount off 10-User Pack is 20%. Discount off 20-User Pack is 25%. Offer is available in Canada and the United States only. Offer may be redeemed from the Adobe Store by calling 800-585-0774, via your Adobe Authorized Reseller, or the Adobe Open Options Licensing Program. Other licensing product participation and discounts may vary. This offer is subject to change or withdrawal without notice. Void where prohibited by law.

Adobe, the Adobe logo, and Font Folio are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries. OpenType is either a registered trademark or a trademark of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

© 2008 Adobe Systems Incorporated. All rights reserved.
author: Miss Tiffany
